submission:
class Solution:
    def countOfPairs(self, nums: List[int]) -> int:
        N = len(nums)
        MOD = 10 ** 9 + 7

        L = [1 for _ in range(nums[0] + 1)]

        for i in range(1, N):
            X = nums[i - 1]
            Y = nums[i]

            presum = [0 for _ in range(len(L) + 1)]
            for x in range(len(L)):
                presum[x + 1] = presum[x] + L[x]



            L2 = [0 for _ in range(Y + 1)]

            for j in range(Y + 1):
                imin = min(j, X - Y + j)
                imin = max(-1, imin)
                imin = min(imin, X)

                L2[j] += presum[imin + 1]
                L2[j] = L2[j] % MOD
            
            L = L2

        
        return sum(L) % MOD
